entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
